title: What a Time to Be a Zeit 9/1: Chris Paul, Benioff & Weiss, Biden/Harris Animal Crossing, Defund NPR, Niecy Nash
itunes:title: What a Time to Be a Zeit 9/1: Chris Paul, Benioff & Weiss, Biden/Harris Animal Crossing, Defund NPR, Niecy Nash
description:
On this edition of What a Time to Be a Zeit Jack and Super Producer Anna Hossnieh discuss Chris Paul going OFF against the Rockets, Benioff and Weiss are getting another shot at adaptation with The 3 Body Problem, Joe Biden and Kamala Harris are doing ads based in the world of Animal Crossing, people don't know how NPR is funded, and Niecy Nash recently married Jessica Betts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
